attributes.action: lift dangerous dogs that attack,but didnt get to bite because it was attacked back
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: my familys pet dog was vicously attacked and badly injured by my neighbours dog.that same dog attacked my wife and three year old son.my wife had to fight for her life and my sons.there was a physical fight between her and the dog.the dog would not stop attacking them.my wife had to get into the car to get away.the police and the council were notified,but they said there hands were tied because the dog didnt actually bite them.this dog has been loose since.my wife and son will be savagly attacked by this dog,until then nobody will remove the dog.this dog should be lifted .we are in fear of this dog.not 1 apoligie have we got from the owner.when my wife rang up to discuss the dog ,the owner rang the police on her.something needs to be done.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
